attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: reduce the toll to a resonable £1 fee for cars lorries etc this would lead to more tourism,shopping,lower the tax burden on moving goods over the bridge,leading to more money in the economy,and in peoples pockets. open up this terrible barrier that the bridge toll inflicts on the area.the taxpayers of the uk pay for northern rock,the olympics,millenium dome,why not for this bridge.
